messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

issue meeting room sent monday issue meeting room hello we have issue with meeting room could you please fix thanks regards master

message.reasoning:

I'm evaluating the description "issue meeting room sent monday issue meeting room hello we have issue with meeting room could you please fix thanks regards master" against the available categories: "Hardware", "HR Support", "Access", "Miscellaneous", and "Storage". My goal is to assign the most fitting category.
